description: This is a Python source file defining API routes for a dashboard, using FastAPI framework. It provides an endpoint to retrieve various aggregated statistics related to projects and clients for an authenticated user.

classes.name: DashboardStats
classes.description: A data model representing aggregated dashboard statistics including project counts, client counts, revenue, and recent projects.

classes.name: Project
classes.description: A data model representing project details used within dashboard statistics, likely a Pydantic schema.

methods.name: get_dashboard_stats(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security))
methods.description: Async function that retrieves and calculates dashboard statistics for the authenticated user, including project and client counts, total revenue, and recent projects.
